analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/6/0xc554d49dd442cd907524ca998f0cf98ce7846e2a.sol:
	Contract Dignity has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/6/0xc554d49dd442cd907524ca998f0cf98ce7846e2a.sol#196-197)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/6/0xc554d49dd442cd907524ca998f0cf98ce7846e2a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/6/0xc554d49dd442cd907524ca998f0cf98ce7846e2a.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/6/0xc554d49dd442cd907524ca998f0cf98ce7846e2a.sol#71-72) is not in mixedCase
